txt.en: Cánnakh can be found in Aughaire.\n\nYou should speak with Cánnakh.
Roving Threat: Ashthrok, the Fire Seeker
Foul, ancient evil from The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu has made its way to the surface of Angmar, including Ashthrok, who feels no pain from the deep fires.
Ashthrok can be found somewhere in Angmar.\n\nYou should defeat Ashthrok.

'Have you been to The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu?\n\n'Did you know that the deep fires imbue the evil creatures with unheard strengths? Ashthrok is one of these abominations. His feet melt sand! I shall continue my research on the why these creatures of The Rift have made their way to the surface. Be careful out there!'

'You have returned the Fire-troll to The Rift, have you?\n\n'Thank you for your help. I am making progress on my research. It seems that there are many ancient stories about Angmar that have been passed down over the years.'
